text: nishchay hee unhonne (saty ka) inakaar kiya, jinhonne kaha, "allaah marayam ka beta maseeh hee hai." jab maseeh ne kaha tha, "ai isaraeel kee santaan! allaah kee bandagee karo, jo mera bhee rab hai aur tumhaara bhee rab hai. jo koee allaah ka saajhee thaharaega, usapar to allaah ne jannat haraam kar dee hai aur usaka thikaana aag hai. atyaachaariyon ko koee sahaayak nahin.
